snippet: The organization is responsible for slightly more than $44.2 million in fees for O’Bannon’s lawyers and $1.5 million in costs and expenses.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Nathanael Cousins orders NCAA to pay over $46 million to retired basketball player Ed O’Bannon for costs related to lawsuit over college athletes being paid for use of their names, images and likenesses.
lead_paragraph: The organization is responsible for slightly more than $44.2 million in fees for O’Bannon’s lawyers and $1.5 million in costs and expenses.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Ordered to Pay $46 Million in Ed O’Bannon Case
